text: Ann Mary School is a private school on GMS Road in Dehradun. It is a senior secondary English medium, co-educational school affiliated to the Council for the Indian School Certificate Examinations. == The Founders == Dr Deepak Arora and his wife Mrs Silvia founded the school in 1985. Ann and Mary were the name of the two grand mothers of Silvia, who contributed money towards building the school. Currently, Dr Deepak Arora is the Principal while Mrs Silvia is the Director of Education.http://www.annmaryschool.com/component/content/article/34-demo- category/49-welcome-to-ann-mary-school ==References== Category:High schools and secondary schools in Uttarakhand Category:Private schools in Uttarakhand Category:Schools in Dehradun Category:Educational institutions established in 1985 Category:1985 establishments in India
title: Ann Mary School
